RelatedSentence: President of the Republic of Uzbekistan Islam Karimov on May 19 left for the People 's Republic of China to take part in the session of the fourth summit of the Conference on Interaction and Confidence Building Measures in Asia .
On May 20 , Islam Karimov and President of the PRC Xi Jinping are to hold a bilateral meeting in Shanghai .

During the anticipated talks the two heads of state are to discuss in detail the priority target tasks of the strategic partnership and the prospective issues in the further buildup of the multifaceted cooperation between our two nations .
On May 21 , the President of Uzbekistan is to take part in the session of the fourth summit of the Conference on Interaction and Confidence Building Measures in Asia .
